headline.0: Why Smart Bosses Give Bad Employees a Raise
headline.1: Children With Special Needs Deserve America's Support

short_description.0: Successful managers have the maturity to recognize that good employees may do things that look bad to others, but they may do them for important reasons. Here is why a manager might decide to give a raise to a "bad" employee.
short_description.1: Children and adults with special needs deserve America's best effort. As I said recently on national radio, America can do much better than it's doing in the health care field.

authors.1: Ray Flynn, ContributorFormer U.S. Ambassador to the Vatican and Mayor of Boston. Adv...
